item.title: Personal R cheatsheet
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.3.3 ## ✔ tibble 2.1.3 ✔ dplyr 0.8.3 ## ✔ tidyr 1.0.0 ✔ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✔ readr 1.3.1 ✔ forcats 0.4.0 ## ── Conflicts ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() Update NAMESPACE: devtools::document() Local check for travis: devtools::check(remote = TRUE) left_join, full_join, etc: merging two tables crossing: all combination of values; expand?
